comments:
I am using Eclipse 3.2M6
I get:
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext.run(ModalContext.java:350)

when I attempt to externalize strings from one of my classes.
This occurs only if I try to use the Eclipse string externalization mechanism.

Here are the steps:
Source > Externalize strings from the editor context menu
Check "Use Eclipse's string externalization mechanism"
Select Next.
The next page says:
"A fatal error occurred while performing the refactoring."
In the "Found problems" area it says:
"An unexpected exception occurred while creating a change object. See the error log for more details."

Here is the stack trace from the error log:
